name: Think Logik Trainer: Think Again
description:
Think Again for the NDS is the second part of the Logic Trainer series that contains the disciplines language, comprehension, maths, memory, logical, three-dimensional reasoning and audiovisual.

Based on the famous and successful German board game licence of Ravensburger, Think Again offers different puzzles, riddles and brainteasers that enhances the ability to use both sides of the brain. The player will be guided through the different levels by a character who will comment on the player's results and give advice on how to improve in the various challenges. Furthermore, the player has a constant documentation of his learning progress which is edited graphically and saved for later reviews. In the multiplayer mode the player gets the chance to compete against friends and family members to figure out who is the biggest brainiac!

Features includes the option to adjust the game for right-handed or left-handed player, multiplayer (multicard and hotseat) where players can compete in seven tasks and 21 new mini games in seven different disciplines.
